page.title: 07Neatishead: Village, Broad
page.content: 06340320 NEATISHEAD: HOUSES, SHOPS, PO, INN Nucleas of Neatishead village including 50% habitable dwellings, shops, inn, restaurant, post office, public phone box, village hall, car parks, village sign with derivation of village name, abattoir, nursery, staithe at navigable limit of Limekiln Dyke connecting to Barton Broad, network of drainage dykes and stream to Limekiln Dyke. Satellite village of Workhouse Common with housing and drainage dykes into Alderfen Broad. 06350320 NEATISHEAD: FARM, WELAND TO BROAD Bordering Barton Broad and Irstead Farming area cropping arable, corn/ sugar been/potatoes. Area of woodland and carr (wetland) and open water (fringe of Barton Broad). Farm buildings and a hotel on drainage dyke
